```{r params}
park <- params$park
year_start <- params$year_start
year_current <- params$year_current

site_df <- getSites(park = park)[,c("SiteCode", "SiteName", "UnitCode", "UnitName")]
site_list <- sort(unique(site_df$SiteCode))
park_name <- unique(site_df$UnitName)
```
